Package comp3110.mechanismsDomain

Class Transition

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp3110.mechanismsDomain.Transition
  • public class Transition
extends java.lang.Object
    All transitions between states in an xtUML state model are implemented as instances of the Transition class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) int event  
      (package private) State fromState  
      (package private) State toState  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Transition​(State fromState, State toState, int event)
      Constructs a transition between two states that will occur in response to a given event.

      int getEvent()
      returns the ID of the event associated with the transition

      returns the to state of the transition

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transition

        public Transition​(State fromState,
                  State toState,
                  int event)
        Constructs a transition between two states that will occur in response to a given event.
        Parameters:
        fromState - the state from which the event will cause a transition
        toState - the state to which the object is required to move
        event - the ID of the event that will cause the transition
